info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Mecklenburg and southwestern Union Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Indian Land, or near Marvin, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Weddington, Wesley Chapel, Waxhaw, Mineral Springs, Marvin, Pineville, Wingate, Indian Trail and South Charlotte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
